originalText.text: These guys are brarnd building experts! They created an organic strategy based on our company's vision and saw that it was implemented smoothly. We saw a significant increase in brand awareness and have been very pleased with the results.

text.text: These guys are brarnd building experts! They created an organic strategy based on our company's vision and saw that it was implemented smoothly. We saw a significant increase in brand awareness and have been very pleased with the results.

originalText.text: I worked here as an intern, free labor, while obtaining my undergraduate degree. The owner of the company, Marva Britto, had us interns on edge and she was very discouraging when I told her I wanted to be an entrepreneur like herself.  She actually laughed at me and I still do not know what was so funny? She barely had any clients herself.  She hires interns to work for her, she is clearly trying to save money. She is worst person to work for and I am surprised she is still in business. The employees that work there are probably afraid of her she is not personable. While I was there Marva showed favoritism amongst her employees, she expects her employees to do the impossible and they are expected to work like machines.. she needs to use common sense.. people are people and we all make mistakes. Learn that Britto! Terrible woman and an even worst place to work. Stay clear.
